mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timetable (date, period_number, day_of_week, subject_id, teacher_id, classroom_id) VALUES (#{date}, #{periodNumber}, #{dayOfWeek}::day_of_week, #{subject.id}, #{teacher.id}, #{classroom.id})
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, s.name as subject_name, tr.first_name as teacher_first_name, tr.last_name as teacher_last_name, c.number as classroom_number FROM timetable t LEFT JOIN subject s ON t.subject_id = s.id LEFT JOIN teacher tr ON t.teacher_id = tr.id LEFT JOIN classroom c ON t.classroom_id = c.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
